publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5783 Stewart Stevenson: Scotland v Georgia—That the Parliament wishes the Scottish football team every success in its match against Georgia on Saturday 24 March 2007; looks forward to the exciting hospitality which will undoubtedly be on offer for the "Tartan Army" in Tbilisi for the return leg, and urges all Scottish parliamentarians to support the Scottish team, especially any with a close affinity to the late Ioseb Besarionis Dze Jughashvili of Georgia. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Mike Pringle*, Fergus Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Ms Sandra White*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bruce Crawford*

S2M-5783 Stewart Stevenson: Scotland v Georgia—That the Parliament wishes the Scottish football team every success in its match against Georgia on Saturday 24 March 2007; looks forward to the exciting hospitality which will undoubtedly be on offer for the "Tartan Army" in Tbilisi for the return leg, and urges all Scottish parliamentarians to support the Scottish team, especially any with a close affinity to the late Ioseb Besarionis Dze Jughashvili of Georgia. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mike Pringle, Fergus Ewing, Jim Mather, Ms Sandra White, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Bruce Crawford, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-5783 Scotland v Georgia (lodged on 22 March 2007) John Swinburne*

S2M-5783 Stewart Stevenson: Scotland v Georgia—That the Parliament wishes the Scottish football team every success in its match against Georgia on Saturday 24 March 2007; looks forward to the exciting hospitality which will undoubtedly be on offer for the "Tartan Army" in Tbilisi for the return leg, and urges all Scottish parliamentarians to support the Scottish team, especially any with a close affinity to the late Ioseb Besarionis Dze Jughashvili of Georgia. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mike Pringle, Fergus Ewing, Jim Mather, Ms Sandra White, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Bruce Crawford, Fiona Hyslop, John Swinburne
